subject: Re: [junit] JDK 1.1.8 and JUnit
msgSnippet: As for as I know, they all do. If 3.7 does not work, try 3.5 or earlier. JBR. ... -- ======================================= J. B. Rainsberger, founder,
messageBody:
As for as I know, they all do. If 3.7 does not work, try 3.5 or earlier.

JBR.

Francois Beausoleil wrote:

> Hello everyone,
>
> I would like to know which version of JUnit works under JDK 1.1.8 ? I
> have a
> project that must run under Lotus Notes and Notes implements the 1.1.8
> JVM.
>
> Thank you,
> Francois Beausoleil
>

--
